posts.post_content:
I've been very reluctant to sell this card because its the nicest T-206 I've ever owned.
It has been assigned the technical grade of PSA 2 because it has a miniscule tear in the upper border that is very difficult to see with the naked eye.
Otherwise this card presents like a PSA 7 in every way.

The color, image clarity and squeaky clean Sweet Cap 350 Back are impecable.
You will be very, very pleased with this card as it will fit very nicely in any high end T206 collection despite the slab.

$125.
First "I'll take it" owns this beauty.
RayB
Email or PM.
Can you post a scan of the back please?

Price reduced. You will be blown away by this card if you buy it!
RayB
